text:
The next R Contribution Working Group meeting is on June 17, 2022, at 15:00 UTC

Register in advance for this meeting:
<https://us02web.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZwvdeGsqzgjEtXKxfEBQ39Ab65fYi8IvLE6>

People on the mailing list should have received an invite - if you want to be added to the mailing list, send me a DM.

At this meeting we will be discussing final preparations for the Bug BBQ. I've been talking to some folks at RStudio about the possibility of setting up a Workbench with R-devel, which may make the workflow easier, especially if we can tie in with the GitHub workflow for testing (so there is no need to build R-devel locally for testing). It will help to have your input on this and other aspects!

People on the mailing list should have received an invite - if you want to be added to the mailing list, send me a DM.

At this meeting we will be discussing final preparations for the Bug BBQ. It will help to have your input on this and other aspects!
